author: Nirnimesh Kumar
text:
A Delhi court on Friday asked the Delhi police to file an action taken report on a criminal complaint against actors Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan for allegedly entering the sets at a temple with shoes on while shooting for the reality show ‘Bigg Boss 9’.

Additional Chief Metropolitan Magistrate V.K. Gautam asked the Roop Nagar Station House Officer in North Delhi to file the report by February 12 stating what action he had taken on the complaint.

The complainant, advocate Gaurav Gulati had alleged that the act of the two actors had hurt his religious sentiments.

The two actors could have entered the sets of the temple with shoes on and showing their back to the Hindu goddess Kali’s idol intentionally, counsel for the complainant, Vikram Singh Saini, submitted before the court.
title: Report sought on case against Shah Rukh, Salman
